page.title: 09SCHOOL LIFE
page.content: The school day starts a 8_50 a.m. although the children from R.A.F. Coltishall arrive at around 8_30. There is an assembly each day which is taken by members of staff or by the children. The morning is divided by a break from 10_40 to 10_55 and lunch is at 12 noon. The afternoon session starts at 12_50 and ends at 2_45 p.m. Besides the normal academic activities the school has clubs (after school hours) for badminton, gymnastics, art and craft, computer studies and soft tennis. There are school football and netball teams. During school hours the children are able to develop their musical activities through the two school choirs, the school orchestra and individual instrumental tuition.
